EmailTemplate.name: VHM-Appliance-Nurture6.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo VHM: Can We Help You Get Healthy?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
No Matter Your Hypervisor, We Want You to Be Healthy. Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’re out to do good in the world, and our free and unlimited VMTurbo Virtual Health Monitor <http://bit.ly/1kpHHNA> (VHM) is just one of the ways we’re doing it.
Need help installing VHM? Contact us <sales@vmturbo.com>. We want you to be healthy.
In good health, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contact us <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker>
